sentences.en: "I didn't ask you to come. Incidentally, why have you come?"
sentences.cn: “我没有叫你来。顺便问一下，你为什么来呢？”

sentences.en: I have to go now. Incidentally, if you want that book, I'll bring it next time.
sentences.cn: 我要走了. 顺便说一句, 如果你要那本书, 我下次带给你.

sentences.en: In our discussion this question was incidentally brought up.
sentences.cn: 在我们讨论时,这一问题被偶然提了出来.

sentences.en: Incidentally , it is just nonsensical to talk of fattening food.
sentences.cn: 同样,如果讨论什么“增肥”食物, 那也是废话.

sentences.en: Incidentally, did you know that my uncle is visiting us?
sentences.cn: 须便说一下, 你知道我叔叔来看我们 吗 ?

sentences.en: Incidentally, have you heard the news about Sue?
sentences.cn: 顺便问一句，你听说过休的事了吗？

sentences.en: Incidentally, I think you still owe me some money.
sentences.cn: 顺便说一句, 我想你还欠我一些钱.
顺便问一下，你在哪儿出生的？

sentences.en: Incidentally, why don't you send me a photograph of yourself?
sentences.cn: 顺便提一下, 你为什么不把你的照片寄给我一张 呢 ?

sentences.en: Incidentally, you forgot to put a return address on this package.
sentences.cn: 随便说一句, 你忘了在包裹上写明回邮址了.

sentences.en: Jessica obeyed, incidentally touching at her lovely hair and looking at a little jewel - faced watch.
sentences.cn: 杰西卡遵命别好领带夹, 顺手摸了摸她那可爱的头发,又看了一下宝石镶面的小表.

sentences.en: October 15 was my final day at the office, and incidentally my fifty - fourth birthday.
sentences.cn: 10月15日是我到办公室上班的最后一天, 凑巧当天也是我五十四岁生日.

sentences.en: Only Himmler said incidentally that the war ought to be finished by the beginning of October.
sentences.cn: 只有希姆莱偶然说过,战争应该在10月初结束.

sentences.en: Quite incidentally, I got some useful information at the party.
sentences.cn: 我在聚会上无意中得到了一些有用信息。

sentences.en: That pilot is now, incidentally, a well - known newspaper publisher in Munich.
sentences.cn: 那个飞行员现在已经成了慕尼黑一位颇有声望的报刊发行人.

sentences.en: The letter mentioned my great-aunt and uncle only incidentally.
sentences.cn: 信中仅附带提到了我的姑奶奶和叔叔。

sentences.en: The tower, incidentally, dates from the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 那座塔，顺便提一下，可以追溯到12世纪。

sentences.en: The wine, incidentally, goes very well with a mature cheese.
sentences.cn: 顺便说一下，这种葡萄酒配熟干酪味道很好。

sentences.en: When two industrial giants clash, small companies can get caught in the cross - fire , ie harmed incidentally.
sentences.cn: 两大企业争斗之下, 小公司遭受池鱼之殃.

words.tran_cn: [光] 入射的；附带的；易发生的，伴随而来的
附带的；偶然的；容易发生的
附带事件；偶然事件；杂项

trans.tran_cn: 顺便，偶然地，不经意地，附带，捎带
trans.tran_en: You use incidentally to introduce a point that is not directly relevant to what you are saying, often a question or extra information that you have just thought of
